channel.title: Silab client on your site
channel.description: Hi, this is for the people who want to have silab's client on their site, this isn't tutorial just a piece of html. Open a new text file and put this in it [code]

item.title: Silab client on your site
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

silabs site goes down alot (no offence silab). So when hers is down u no longer have a web client for your site. I suggest navigating straight to the .jar file on silabs site. Use firefox to download it (figure that out own ur own ) upload it to your site and change the client.silabsoft.org to the url of the jar file on your site.

Read full topic

item.title: Silab client on your site
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Hi, this is for the people who want to have silab’s client on their site, this isn’t tutorial just a piece of html.
Open a new text file and put this in it <P ALIGN=center><IFRAME SRC="http://www.client.silabsoft.org/" WIDTH=775 HEIGHT=720></IF1RAME></P> and save it as silab.htm or whatever you wish to, just make sure it has .htm in the end. After that just put it on your site and you’re done. Kty.

THIS ISN’T A TUTORIAL, DON’T PUT IT IN THE TUTORIAL SECTION

Read full topic
